title: Last day to get this home golf simulator for over $200 off in time for Christmas
content:
Macworld

Is the golfer in your life lamenting the cold weather and wishing they could get outside for one more round? Rather than catch hypothermia, give them a gift that will help them golf right from the comfort of their living room. The TruGolf Mini Golf Simulator is the perfect gift for golf lovers and now through December 17, it’s available for one of the lowest prices ever.

This clever set uses E6 CONNECT software to give your favorite golfer access to a state-of-the-art virtual golf experience. There are more than 100 courses, four driving ranges, 13 chip and putt ranges, and 16 mini games, giving them a fount of options for honing their skills and enjoying the game. The set comes with a weighted impact trainer that simulates the feeling of a real club and TruGolf’s mini sensor that captures a wealth of real-time data to reproduce accurate shots.

Help your golfer play through the winter. Now through December 17, you can get TruGolf Mini golf simulator for 56% off $399 at just $172.97. Hurry and order by December 7 for guaranteed delivery by Christmas.
